abstract: The behavior of the markets at their October peak raises hope that the recent decline may not turn out to be severe — and that it may have already run its course.
snippet: The behavior of the markets at their October peak raises hope that the recent decline may not turn out to be severe — and that it may have already run its course.
lead_paragraph: FROM at least one perspective, the stock market peak of last October was not accompanied by the speculative excesses found at the height of previous bull markets. This raises hope that the market decline that began in the fall may not turn out to be severe  and that it may have already run its course.

headline.main: A Sign of Hope for Stocks
headline.print_headline: A Sign Of Hope For Stocks

abstract: Hints of stagflation and continuing worries about slumping growth weighed on investors as the major stock indexes ended an erratic week of ups and downs.
snippet: Hints of stagflation and continuing worries about slumping growth weighed on investors as the major stock indexes ended an erratic week of ups and downs.
lead_paragraph: Hints of stagflation and continuing worries about slumping growth weighed on investors as the major stock indexes ended an erratic week of ups and downs.

headline.main: A Rocky Week Ends With Gains
headline.print_headline: A Rocky Week Ends With Gains
